entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Methods for the Uri class #115250
  • [API Proposal]: Rename arguments for SVE GatherVector APIs #115246
  • [createdump] InitializeDAC: GetProcAddress(CLRDataCreateInstance) Failure #115245
    10.0.0
  • Arm64 SVE: Implement missing predicate methods #115244
  • Arm64 SVE: Implement missing load methods #115243
  • Arm64 SVE: Implement missing scatter methods #115242
  • [API Proposal]: Add defaulted offset to the SVE load/store APIs #115241
  • string.AsSpan(int, int) throws a misleading exception #115239

Closed

  • [Apple mobile] System.Globalization.IOS.Tests failures with undetermined language tag extensions #115238
    10.0.0
  • X509CertificateLoader can't load public key from pfx file without password #115137
  • JIT: Avx512BW Compare Debug/Release difference #114978
    10.0.0
  • Binding source generator emits bad code for tuples #115133
    Future
  • How to resolve AOT when using Marshal.PtrToStructure occurs IL2091 warnings #115140
  • [API Proposal]: `Interlocked.Increment` does not have an overload for `nint` nor `nuint` #115237
  • [API Proposal]: change GCHandle<T>.ToIntPtr to be an instance method #115053
  • Transient NullReferenceException when calling HttpClient.GetAsync #115179
  • Add TrySingle<TSource>(IEnumerable<TSource>, out TSource) #16362
  • EventSourceLogger does not propagate state data during ActivityStart #33486
  • Azure DevOps: .NET build fails on macOS 15.3 but succeeds on macOS 15.2 – what's changed? #113390
  • `DynamicallyAccessedMembers` annotations do not seem to be working on type delcarations. #113650
  • [area-Tools-ILLink]: ILLinker is failing when building a mac-catalyst app #110714
  • [Feature Proposal]: Support isolated islands of assemblies for AOT compilation #115231
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 12/2/2024 3:41:04 PM #110584
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Onboard the GitHub Action based Issue-Labeler #115256
    area-Infrastructure
  • Dump more info in JitDump for HWIHNTRINSIC nodes #115255
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable revocation list tests for ML-DSA and SLH-DSA #115254
    area-System.Security
  • Remove HMF from IL_Throw/IL_ThrowExact/IL_Rethrow #115253
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • EH support in the interpreter #115252
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • [DRAFT] try enabling regions on Mac again #115251
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Attempt to load X.509 keys as ECDH keys first #115249
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Improve crossbuild inference #115247
    source-build, area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fold "X < NN && X >= 0" to "X u>= NN" #115240
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove always searching executable directory for native libraries in single-file applications #115236
    breaking-change, area-Single-File, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 10.0.0
  • Remove ymm embedded rounding from AVX10.2 #115235
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Fix UrlAttribute handling of relative Uris #115234
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Minor tensor fixes #115125
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Fix globalization test on mobile platforms #115248
    area-System.Globalization, 10.0.0
  • Add VMOVD VMOVW APIs in JIT #115068
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Convert JIT_Box* to C# #115134
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Speed up floating to integer casts on x86/x64 #114410
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Shrink data section for const vector loads #114040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Accelerate long -> floating casts on x86 #113930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support SLH-DSA keys in certs #115212
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #115214
    area-codeflow
  • Log error to host #114944
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add bootstrapping build mechanism and enable for SourceBuild #114285
    source-build, area-Infrastructure
  • Interpreter EH support in the runtime #114649
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Ensure VN produces correctly initialized simdmask_t #115227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix config source gen with value tuple #115233
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 10.0.0

Updated

  • [wasm] Use packedsimd in hexconverter #115062
    NO-MERGE
  • Unmasking EGPRs in register allocator #114867
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    tenet-performance, area-Interop-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2700758 #115228
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • [cDAC] Implement IXCLRDataProcess.EnumMethodInstancesByAddress #115131
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add long/ulong->float cast helpers #114597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cDAC] Implement ISOSDacImpl.GetAssemblyList #114800
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add CPUID for AvxVnniInt8 and AvxVnniInt16 #113956
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [DRAFT] Write barrier without any RWX pages #114982
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Interpreter GC info stage 3: Report locals to the GC #114469
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Includes type forwarding for System.Text.Unicode.Utf8 to the Microsoft.Bcl.Memory library #111292
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Improve System.Collections.BitArray #115069
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • JIT: refactor escape analysis to be more bv-centric #115213
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean up stale debugger-related surface area in ThreadPool and Task{Scheduler} #115210
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix crash during Async Break when APC and CET are enabled #114932
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.6
  • [release/9.0-staging] Don't expose TrustedCertificatesDirectory() and StartNewTlsSessionContext() to NetFx #114995
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, 9.0.6
  • [release/8.0-staging] Don't expose TrustedCertificatesDirectory() and StartNewTlsSessionContext() to NetFx #115008
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.17
  • [release/9.0] Fix edge cases in Tarjan GC bridge (Android) #114682
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, os-android, area-GC-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.6
  • [Android] Support static linking of CoreCLR on Android #114629
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • Enable SVE2 instruction set detection for ARM64 #115117
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • JIT: use root compiler instance for sufficient PGO observation #115119
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ML-DSA+COSE #115158
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • arm64: Additions with GetActiveElementCount() should use incp when given the same predicate #114628
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Replace NET6_0 with NET #115209
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Use SDK ILLink analyzer for OOBs for downlevel TFMs #114983
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Draft] Tar: Refine GNU timestamp handling #115211
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Update DotNetBuild.props #115229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
